name: Chocolate Turtle Cheesecake
instructions: To make a homemade crust use 1 1/2 cups chocolate sandwich cookie crumbs with 3 Tbsp melted butter.
Place caramels and evaporated milk in a pan.
Heat over medium low heat stirring continually, until smooth, about 5 minutes.
Combine cream cheese, sour cream, and milk in blender.
Add pudding mix; process for about 30 seconds longer.
Pour pudding mix over caramel layer, covering evenly.
Chill, loosely covered, until set, about 15 minutes.
Drizzle fudge topping over pudding layer in a decorative pattern.
Chill loosely covered until serving time.
